channel.title: Rune Nova [Delta]
channel.description:
[center] [img]http://i917.photobucket.com/albums/ad13/jeonva5746/banner.png[/img]
[size=12pt][u][b]-Details-[/b][/u][/size]
[b]Developers:[/b] [b]-Coder:[/b] me [b]-Graphics:[/b] me [b]Revision:[/b] 317
[size=12pt][u][b]-Introduction-[/b][/u][/size]
[i]After playing lots of RSPS and quitting Runescape I decided to start modifying my own private server. I chose the base delta since I'm familiar with it and I'm a nooby programmer. Tbh, I only started learning java after coming here to Mopar which I kinda regret. Anyway, I'm reading a book and I'm asking other people for help on real coding so hopefully I'll be able to achieve something in this source instead of just moving shops, home and renaming shit. I've only been working on this source for about a week only spending 2 hours of my time a day on it so progress is really slow. I wanted to make this server unique by adding custom features that other servers don't have and bringing something new to delta(lol). I don't plan on hosting this server since I haven't got any cash and I cba to find a hoster so I'll probably end up releasing it.[/i]
[size=12pt][u][b]-Server Information-[/b][/u][/size] [b]Base:[/b] Optimized Delta 1.5 [hr] [size=12pt][b][u]-Completed-[/u][/b][/size]
[b]Npc flinching - fix :)[/b]
[b]Control Commands[/b] -Simple enough, just made some commands that toggles dropping, trading, yelling, using commands, and spawning just in case.
[b]Server Control Panel[/b] [img]http://i917.photobucket.com/albums/ad13/jeonva5746/panel.png[/img]
[b]Play Time Calculator[/b] - I think I will remove the daysPlayed for the veteran system
[b]Trivia Bot[/b] - just need to add questions & answers now
[hr] [size=12pt][b]-In-Progress-[/b][/size]
[b]Custom achievement system 10%[/b] - Make a new character file that contains achievement information. 100% [img]http://i917.photobucket.com/albums/ad13/jeonva5746/achi.png[/img] - Achievements base 100% - Add achievements 12%
[b]Cleaning out useless codes -N/A[/b] -Common sense, just cleaning out some unused methods.
[b]PK System - 70%[/b] - Pk points after kills. 100% - Killing Streak 100%(I MADE THIS BEFORE THE TUTORIAL WAS RELEASED) - Wanted/bounty 80%
[b]Veteran System - 85%[/b] - Auto-veteran 100% - Veteran Benefits 0%
[b]Skills 1%[/b] - All skills will be handled.
[b]Herblore 50%[/b] - Potions - 20% - Animation and timers 100%
[b]Crafting 25%[/b] - Gems - 50% - Animation - 100% - Interfaces 0%
[b]Thieving 35%[/b] - Stuff disappears when you steal from stalls 100% - Made most stalls "thievable" 10% - Pickpocketing 0%
[hr] [b][size=12pt]-Not Started-[/size][/b]
[b]Add Home - ANYWHERE EXCEPT EDGE [/b]
[b]Add Shops[/b]
[b][color=red]Skills[/b]
- Prayer - Runecrafting - Agility - Fletching - Slayer - Mining - Smithing - Fishing - Cooking - Firemaking - Woodcutting - Farming - Achieving(looking for a better word)
[b]Prayer[/b] -474 prayers
[b]Jail system[/b]
[b]Working emotes(474 emote interface)[/b]
[b][i]More to come...[/i][/b] [hr] [size=12pt][u][b]-Client Information-[/b][/u][/size] Base: Galkons Enhanced v4 or RuneLimited
[u][b][size=12pt]-Media-[/size][/b][/u] [img]http://i917.photobucket.com/albums/ad13/jeonva5746/login.png[/img] [img]http://i917.photobucket.com/albums/ad13/jeonva5746/played.png[/img] Vid for pk is being uploaded More coming soon...
[u][b][size=12pt]-Update Log-[/size][/b][/u]
[code]
Date: October 21 & 22, 2011
- Finished the wanted system - Server now calculates how long you have played - Added Graham's Cycle-based Task Manager - Created a class that handles events - Added Nova Points for the achievements - Started a base for a trivia system :P - Added server messages - Made the "Constants" class more like P.I's Config class - [s]Started a base on the auto-veteran system[/s] Finished the auto-veteran
Date: October 23, 2011
- Started on thieving, made stalls disappear when you click them need to work on other stuff now - Finished a triviabot-base just need to add some stuff in it now - Prevented starters from dropping and trading [/code]
I'll be updating this regularly.
[u][b][size=12pt]-Credits-[/size][/b][/u] [i]Me Delta Kingdomkey01 Galkon and other people that worked on the client Rod3r I think for the panel? Graham[/i]
[/center]

item.title: Rune Nova [Delta]
item.dc:creator: @R3minice R3minice
item.description:
@R3minice wrote:

Yep, I’ll update it in a few minutes.

EDIT:

@demps2k9 thanks, I had that in-mind

after 5 mins of long and hard work I managed to finish the veteran system

[youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=AR8yB3lXnw0[/youtube]
Nothing special, I’ve yet to add a message that congratulates the player.

Read full topic

item.title: Rune Nova [Delta]
item.dc:creator: @demps2k9 demps2k9
item.description:
@demps2k9 wrote:

Achievements instead of quests. I like it. Maybe an achievements cape or maybe armour similar to RS?

Read full topic

item.title: Rune Nova [Delta]
item.dc:creator: @R3minice R3minice
item.description:
@R3minice wrote:

Thanks, I do plan on moving to a better and more stable source, something like Runesource in the future.

Read full topic

item.title: Rune Nova [Delta]
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

Kudos for at least wanting to learn something rather than moving stuff around the server to make it look different. Although, I don’t approve of how the server is being programmed, it’s still a fine place of starting, do remember there are a lot of bugs and glitches as well as stability problems within the server.

Good luck with the development nonetheless.

Read full topic

item.title: Rune Nova [Delta]
item.dc:creator: @youridudock youridudock
item.description:
@youridudock wrote:

[quote=“R3minice, post:3, topic:418858”]Thanks

Suppose to be a custom skill for the achievements. I’m having second thoughts about it. But I do need to replace summoning with a custom skill.[/quote]

Ah alright.

item.title: Rune Nova [Delta]
item.dc:creator: @R3minice R3minice
item.description:
@R3minice wrote:

[center]

[size=12pt]-Details-[/size]

Developers:
-Coder: me
-Graphics: me
Revision: 317

[size=12pt]-Introduction-[/size]

After playing lots of RSPS and quitting Runescape I decided to start modifying my own private server. I chose the base delta since I’m familiar
with it and I’m a nooby programmer. Tbh, I only started learning java after coming here to Mopar which I kinda regret. Anyway, I’m reading a book
and I’m asking other people for help on real coding so hopefully I’ll be able to achieve something in this source instead of just moving shops, home
and renaming shit.
I’ve only been working on this source for about a week only spending 2 hours of my time a day on it so progress is really slow.
I wanted to make this server unique by adding custom features that other servers don’t have and bringing something new to delta(lol). I don’t plan
on hosting this server since I haven’t got any cash and I cba to find a hoster so I’ll probably end up releasing it.

[size=12pt]-Server Information-[/size]
Base: Optimized Delta 1.5
[hr]
[size=12pt]-Completed-[/size]

Npc flinching - fix

Control Commands
-Simple enough, just made some commands that toggles dropping, trading, yelling, using commands, and spawning just in case.

Server Control Panel

panel.png731×378

Play Time Calculator

  • I think I will remove the daysPlayed for the veteran system

Trivia Bot

  • just need to add questions & answers now

[hr]
[size=12pt]-In-Progress-[/size]

Custom achievement system 10%

  • Make a new character file that contains achievement information. 100%
  • Achievements base 100%
  • Add achievements 12%

Cleaning out useless codes -N/A
-Common sense, just cleaning out some unused methods.

PK System - 70%

  • Pk points after kills. 100%
  • Killing Streak 100%(I MADE THIS BEFORE THE TUTORIAL WAS RELEASED)
  • Wanted/bounty 80%

Veteran System - 85%

  • Auto-veteran 100%
  • Veteran Benefits 0%

Skills 1%

  • All skills will be handled.

Herblore 50%

  • Potions - 20%
  • Animation and timers 100%

Crafting 25%

  • Gems - 50%
  • Animation - 100%
  • Interfaces 0%

Thieving 35%

  • Stuff disappears when you steal from stalls 100%
  • Made most stalls “thievable” 10%
  • Pickpocketing 0%

[hr]
[size=12pt]-Not Started-[/size]

Add Home - ANYWHERE EXCEPT EDGE

Add Shops

[color=red]Skills

  • Prayer
  • Runecrafting
  • Agility
  • Fletching
  • Slayer
  • Mining
  • Smithing
  • Fishing
  • Cooking
  • Firemaking
  • Woodcutting
  • Farming
  • Achieving(looking for a better word)

Prayer
-474 prayers

Jail system

Working emotes(474 emote interface)

More to come…
[hr]
[size=12pt]-Client Information-[/size]
Base: Galkons Enhanced v4 or RuneLimited

[size=12pt]-Media-[/size]

login.png764×503


Vid for pk is being uploaded
More coming soon…

[size=12pt]-Update Log-[/size]


Date: October 21 & 22, 2011

- Finished the wanted system
- Server now calculates how long you have played
- Added Graham's Cycle-based Task Manager
- Created a class that handles events
- Added Nova Points for the achievements
- Started a base for a trivia system :P
- Added server messages
- Made the "Constants" class more like P.I's Config class
- [s]Started a base on the auto-veteran system[/s] Finished the auto-veteran

Date: October 23, 2011

- Started on thieving, made stalls disappear when you click them need to work on other stuff now
- Finished a triviabot-base just need to add some stuff in it now
- Prevented starters from dropping and trading

I’ll be updating this regularly.

[size=12pt]-Credits-[/size]
Me
Delta
Kingdomkey01
Galkon and other people that worked on the client
Rod3r I think for the panel?
Graham

[/center]

Read full topic
